history.title: THE STORY OF GABRIEL PASTEL
history.subtitle: From a simple school project to a purposeful venture: discover the journey that gave birth to the most delicious vegan pastel shop you've ever known.

2018.title: THE BEGINNING AT ETEC
2018.description1: Gabriel Pastel was born from a Marketing project at ETEC.
2018.description2: The mission was simple: create a brand. But since the teacher also taught web development, he combined the subjects and challenged us to build a website for this brand.

partnership.title: TWO GABRIELS, ONE IDEA
partnership.description1: The programmer speaking to you, Gabriel Alexander, joined forces with his great partner Gabriel Paiva.
partnership.description2: After much reflection and brainstorming... Gabriel... Gabriel looks like what? Pastel! And so, Gabriel Pastel was born, the result of a fun idea full of flavor!

firstSite.title: FIRST DIGITAL STEPS
firstSite.description: With basic HTML and CSS, we created Gabriel Pastel's first website. It was simple, but it fulfilled its role in the school project. Here is the first version of our brand and a link to the original site.

plantBased.title: THE PLANT-BASED TRANSFORMATION
plantBased.description1: At the time, Gabriel Pastel used beef and other animal-derived ingredients. But at the same time, Gabriel Paiva learned about veganism and adopted the lifestyle.
plantBased.description2: He proposed that we transform our business into 100% vegan! And so we did. The transition was natural, and today, Gabriel Pastel is an example of how it's possible to create delicious products without animal cruelty.

relaunch.title: THE RELAUNCH
relaunch.description: After a long pause, Gabriel Alexander decided to revive the project, but this time with modern technologies and an even greater purpose: to bring Gabriel Pastel to real life. The website was rebuilt from scratch with Next.js, React, TypeScript and Prisma, and is now ready to scale.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.description: Today, Gabriel Pastel is more than a snack bar. It's a movement that promotes conscious, sustainable and flavorful eating. We want to show that it's possible to make ethical choices without giving up the pleasure of eating well.

technologies.title: TECHNOLOGIES USED ON THE WEBSITE
technologies.subtitle: This project is the result of much study and dedication. Built with the best modern tools on the market!

contribute.title: WANT TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE PROJECT?
contribute.description: Gabriel Pastel is an open-source project! If you're a developer and want to contribute, check out our repository on GitHub.

impact.title: OUR IMPACT ON THE WORLD
impact.subtitle: At Gabriel Pastel, we believe that small daily choices can transform the world. Every vegan pastel you choose makes a big difference for animals, the planet and your health.

animalWelfare.title: ANIMAL WELFARE
animalWelfare.description1: Millions of animals suffer in cruel conditions to support meat consumption. Each year, billions of animals are raised in confinement, deprived of their basic needs and natural behaviors.
animalWelfare.description2: At Gabriel Pastel, every pastel is made without cruelty, only with flavor, love, and respect for life. Our ingredients are 100% plant-based, ensuring that no animal is harmed for your snack.
animalWelfare.quote: Choosing a meatless pastel is saying no to cruelty ‚Äî one bite at a time.

economy.title: Economy and Reduction
economy.description1: Producing 1kg of beef consumes approximately 15,000L of water, and releases 60kg of greenhouse gases.
economy.description2: Meanwhile, 1kg of soy protein consumes approximately 1,400L of water, and the plant even absorbs CO¬≤.

water.title: 91% less water
water.description: Compared to beef, soy uses almost 10x less water.

co2.title: 97% less CO¬≤
co2.description: Soy emits a fraction of meat's carbon, and even helps capture it.

sustainability.title: SUSTAINABILITY
sustainability.description1: At Gabriel Pastel, we use biodegradable paper packaging, thinking about caring for the planet.
sustainability.description2: The organic waste generated here is sent to composting programs, while recyclables go to recycling, ensuring responsible and sustainable disposal!

animals.title: WHAT DO THE ANIMALS SAY?
animals.subtitle: Meet some of the animals that were spared thanks to our customers' conscious food choices. Every vegan pastel you eat helps save lives like these!

mimosa.name: MIMOSA
mimosa.quote: Thanks to Gabriel Pastel, my milk now feeds my calves. Finally, I'm a real mother.

nilda.name: NILDA
nilda.quote: My wings are no longer clipped to fit in a cage. Today, I fly - my way.

jorgeZoe.name: JORGE AND ZOE
jorgeZoe.quote: Now I can enjoy the mud with my family without worrying about becoming bacon!
